response.original_title: Il Racconto Del Reale - L'Ultimo Stadio
response.overview: The first vertical webseries in 5 episodes on the clashes of 3 May 2014 around the Olympic stadium in Rome, on the occasion of the final of the Coppa Italia Napoli-Fiorentina. The young blue fan Ciro Esposito, wounded by a gunshot, died 53 days later. A harsh condemnation of the current "football system" which is increasingly distinguished by the opaque management of curves, stadiums, sports rights. The telling of a story that will remain in the memory of Italian football.
response.title: Il Racconto Del Reale - L'Ultimo Stadio
